00098             function                add_stat( $Key , $Value )
00099             {
00100                   try
00101                   {
00102                         if( is_array( $Key ) )
00103                         {
00104                               $Key = implode( '#' , $Key );
00105                         }
00106                         
00107                         $Key = $this->Security->get( $Key , 'string' );
00108                         $Key = str_replace( '[sharp]' , '#' , $Key );
00109                         $Value = $this->Security->get( $Value , 'string' );
00110 
00111                         $this->Database->insert( 
00112                               $this->NativeTable , '`key` , `value` , creation_date' , "\"$Key\" , \"$Value\" , NOW()"
00113                         );
00114                         
00115                         $this->Database->commit();
00116                   }
00117                   catch( Exception $e )
00118                   {
00119                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00120                   }
00121             }
00122             
00149             function                get_stat( $Fields , $Condition )
00150             {
00151                   try
00152                   {
00153                         return(
00154                               $this->Database->select( $Fields , $this->NativeTable , $Condition )
00155                         );
